oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #072
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #72, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Columbus Stockade Blues (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- You Only Want Me When You're Lonely (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- He's Gone Up The Trail (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Buffalo Gals (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- A Petal From A Faded Rose (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Hal Horton, Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group)
